radiographic_examinations.findings: Moderate amount of intraperitoneal free air; suspected site of perforation in the sigmoid colon; colonic diverticulosis noted diffusely; thickening of the sigmoid colon and adjacent small bowel segment; mild focal small bowel ileus; air locules in the urinary bladder; no drainable fluid collection; no evidence of focal renal lesions or hydronephrosis; no significant vascular abnormalities.
